input.sentences: even the roofing tiles are so pretty .
some safety steps to climb into the sewers on .
a fire hydrant . so similar to ours !
another really neat tapestry hanging up in our hotel .
output.sentences: I love that sign on the fish market!
And that rusted corrugated roof rules!
I didn't know steel girder steps could be so attractive.
Look at that pink fire hydrant!
I love the beauty that you can find outdoors.
